channel.title: MA Typeface Design at the University of Reading
channel.description: Work from the MA Typeface Design at the University of Reading

item.title: Reflections on practice essays from the 2011 class are now online
item.description: The "Reflections on practice" essays from the 2011 class are now available.

item.title: Work from the 2011 class is now online
item.description: Work from the 2011 class is now online. Note: there will be updates of some of the documents and others will be added later on.

item.title: Six (!) release updates
item.description: Nicolien van der Keur (2007) published her typeface Sirba with TypeTogether, see: http://type-together.com/Sirba Tim Ahrens (2007) released his typeface Herb with his own Just Another Foundry, see: http://justanotherfoundry.com/herb Gerben Dollen (2007) released his typeface Actium with his own type foundry Type Mafia, see: http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/typemafia/actium/ Valentin Brustaux (2007) released his typeface Tiina with OurType: http://ourtype.com Alice Savoie (2007) released her typeface Capucine with Process Type Foundry: http://processtypefoundry.com/fonts/capucine/ Émilie Rigaud (2009) set up her own foundry “A is for Apple” at http://www.aisforapple.eu which also distributes her Coline.

item.title: Work from the 2010 class is now online
item.description: Work from the 2010 class is now online. Note: there will be updates of some of the documents and others will be added later on.

item.title: A few things I’ve learned about typeface design
item.description: An article by Gerry Leonidas not only about Reading MATD programme, but also about the wider context and perspective of typeface design.

item.title: Update to 2009
item.description: Eben Sorkin's Arrotino specimen and RoP has been updated/uploaded.

item.title: (In)visible difference
item.description: The website is now using a new subpixel favicon by Miha (see Typophile thread about subpixel icon design: http://typophile.com/node/60577). Thank you.

item.title: Work from the 2009 class is now online
item.description: Work from the 2009 class is now online

item.title: Updates to 2000–2008 webistes
item.description: Reflection on Practise essays and links to vendors for published typefaces were added.

item.title: Work from the 2000 and 2003 classes
item.description: Work of the 2000 and 2003 years is now online.

item.title: Work from the 2008 class is presented in Typo 2008
item.description: Recently published Typo 35 (www.magtypo.cz) includes a presentation of typefaces by the MATD 2008 graduates on 12 pages. Text by David Březina (with help of students' specimen texts), illustrations by respective designers. See some pictures on flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/typoblog/tags/matd2008/

item.title: Work from the 2004 class
item.description: Work of the 2004 class is now online. Now complete.

item.description: Work of the 2006 class is now online. Now complete.

item.title: Work from the 2008 class
item.description: Download PDF specimens of the typefaces and contact the designers from the MATD 2008 class.
